summary: :: Discontinued :: Standalone version for Tiwa44's Minidresses for UNP.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][font=Courier New][size=3]This mod has been discontinued. If you want a standalone mod for Tiwa44's awesome minidresses I recommend usingÂ Zarrastro's version over at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59975/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59975/?[/url][/size][/font][/b].[/color]
[size=6]
:: Description ::[/size]
Standalone version for Tiwa44's Minidresses for UNP.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47376]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47376/[/url]

Hair on the model comes from SG Hair Pack.

[size=6]:: Instructions ::[/size]
Just install and go!

Can be crafted at Tanning Rack - Misc.


Light Armor version got same armor rating as Fur and can be crafted at the same place as leather armor.

[size=6]:: Video ::[/size]
[youtube]f257GE3ubDc[/youtube]
[size=1][i]Video by xbox2014[/i][/size]

[youtube]PPkhxKZcmPM[/youtube]
[size=1][i]Video by hodilton[/i][/size]


[size=6]:: Credits ::[/size]
Credits to tiwa44 for letting me use the meshes and textures.
author: ESP by Exoclyps - Meshes and Textures by Tiwa44

files.name: Tiwa44s Minidresses - Standalone - Low Resolution
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to version 4 of Tiwa's Minidresses for UNP.
Includes:
* Addition of Fine Clothes 01.
* Fixed a very subtle skin tint bug.
* Unified glissiness and specular strength throughout all the outfits.

Also fixes issues with 1st person for Blacksmith Minidress.
